channel.title: life on Bomby's Website!
channel.description: Recent content in life on Bomby's Website!

item.title: Just a work and uni kinda day...
item.description: Now that I have a system (kinda) working with Hugo and Neocities, I can focus on just writing my blog! Yay. Today, I just went to work and had classes between my shifts. To be honest, the whole day, I was just thinking about how I can get my website to automatically push itself to Neocities… ðŸ˜† I think I might’ve figured it out by using the Github actions: Deploy to Neocities.
